#summary Snapshot releases: When, Where and Why
#labels Featured

Snapshot releases are available at our Maven 2 repository at http://fest.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/fest/m2/repository/

Snapshot releases include the name of the project, version and "-SNAPSHOT". For example: fest-swing-SNAPSHOT.

===What can you expect from snapshot releases?===
  * Latest features
  * Latest bug fixes

===When are snapshot releases updated?===
Every time we add new features and/or we fix bugs. To file enhancement requests (new features) or files bugs at the [http://code.google.com/p/fest/issues/list "Issues" Page].

===Where I can find a list of new features/fixed bugs for each snapshot release?===
  * FEST-Swing: [FESTSwingSnapshots]
